00109             function                fetch_permits_for_object( $Object , $ObjectType = 'page' , $AddGroupPermits = true )
00110             {
00111                   try
00112                   {
00113                         switch( $ObjectType )
00114                         {
00115                               case( 'group' ):$Permits = $this->PermitAccess->get_permits_for_group( $Object );break;
00116                               case( 'menu' ):$Permits = $this->PermitAccess->get_permits_for_menu( $Object );break;
00117                               case( 'page' ):$Permits = $this->PermitAccess->get_permits_for_page( $Object );break;
00118                               case( 'report' ):$Permits = $this->PermitAccess->get_permits_for_report( $Object );break;
00119                               case( 'user' ):
00120                                     $Permits = $this->PermitAccess->get_permits_for_user( $Object );
00121 
00122                                     if( $AddGroupPermits )
00123                                     {
00124                                           $Permits = array_merge( 
00125                                                 $Permits , $this->PermitAccess->get_permits_for_user_group( $Object )
00126                                           );
00127                                     }
00128                               break;
00129                         }
00130                         
00131                         return( $Permits );
00132                   }
00133                   catch( Exception $e )
00134                   {
00135                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00136                   }
00137             }

00174             function                get_permits_for_object( $Object , $ObjectType = 'page' , $AddGroupPermits = true )
00175             {
00176                   try
00177                   {
00178                         $Key = md5( $Object.$ObjectType.$AddGroupPermits );
00179                         
00180                         if( isset( $this->PermitAccess->PermitsCache[ $Key ] ) )
00181                         {
00182                               return( $this->PermitAccess->PermitsCache[ $Key ] );
00183                         }
00184                   
00185                         $Permits = $this->fetch_permits_for_object( $Object , $ObjectType , $AddGroupPermits );
00186 
00187                         $this->PermitAccess->PermitsCache[ $Key ] = $Permits;
00188                         
00189                         return( $this->PermitAccess->PermitsCache[ $Key ] );
00190                   }
00191                   catch( Exception $e )
00192                   {
00193                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00194                   }
00195             }

00227             function                object_has_permit( $Object , $ObjectType , $Permit )
00228             {
00229                   try
00230                   {
00231                         if( $Object === false && $ObjectType == 'user' )
00232                         {
00233                               $Object = $this->UserAlgorithms->get_id();
00234                         }
00235                         
00236                         $ObjectsPermits = $this->get_permits_for_object( $Object , $ObjectType );
00237                         
00238                         return( in_array( $Permit , $ObjectsPermits ) );
00239                   }
00240                   catch( Exception $e )
00241                   {
00242                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );

00276             function                object_has_all_permits( $Object , $ObjectType , $Permits )
00277             {
00278                   try
00279                   {
00280                         $ObjectsPermits = $this->get_permits_for_object( $Object , $ObjectType );
00281                         
00282                         if( is_array( $Permits ) === false )
00283                         {
00284                               $Permits = explode( "," , $Permits );
00285                         }
00286 
00287                         if( count( $Permits ) === count( array_intersect( $ObjectsPermits , $Permits ) ) )
00288                         {
00289                               return( true );
00290                         }
00291                         else
00292                         {
00293                               return( false );
00294                         }
00295                   }
00296                   catch( Exception $e )
00297                   {
00298                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00299                   }
00300             }

00337             {

00389             function                get_users_for_permit( $PermitName )
00390             {
00391                   try
00392                   {
00393                         $PermitName = $this->Security->get( $PermitName , 'command' );
00394                         
00395                         $PermitObject = $this->PermitAccess->get_permit_by_name( $PermitName );
00396                         
00397                         $Link = get_package( 'link' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00398                         
00399                         $Links1 = $Link->get_links( false , get_field( $PermitObject , 'id' ) , 'user' , 'permit' );
00400                         $Links2 = $Link->get_links( false , get_field( $PermitObject , 'id' ) , 'group' , 'permit' );
00401                         $Links3 = $Link->get_links( false , get_field_ex( $Links2 , 'object1_id' ) , 'user' , 'group' );
00402                         
00403                         $Users = array_merge( get_field_ex( $Links1 , 'object1_id' ) , get_field_ex( $Links3 , 'object1_id' ) );
00404                         $Users = array_unique( $Users );
00405                         
00406                         return( $Users );
00407                   }
00408                   catch( Exception $e )
00409                   {
00410                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00411                   }
00412             }
